item.title: Oracle SQL Tutorial - A Few Hints And Tips On How To Optimize Your SQL
item.description:
Oracle SQL Tutorial - A Few Hints And Tips On How To Optimize Your SQL

Use Views

This Oracle SQL tutorial started as a list of SQL tuning tips but that's of limited use on its own so we've expanded the tips to explain how and why they work to make this a more complete Oracle SQL tutorial.

item.title: What is PL/SQL?
item.description:
What is PL/SQL?

This is the first PL/SQL tutorial in the series and provides an overview of the language and its capabilities as well as links to enable you to explore further.

item.title: Multi Level PL/SQL Collections
item.description:
Multi Level PL/SQL Collections

2 Dimensional PL/SQL Collection of an Associative Array of Nested Tables

PL/SQL collections are very useful for modeling more complex or sophisticated data types such as the array, table or set types that exist in other languages. We've seen in previous tutorials that Oracle has 3 types of collections in PL/SQL
